column2: was given to me. We took 3 drinks since we got here. And we're told we are being cut off. We have been here watching march madness
column3: and are excited as such. They gave us the Impression that we are starting trouble and we are not. Please take this in consideration. This place is not friendly for a certain type of people. Have fun and be safe. Gavin
column4: I came up to you and told you we o lay had 3 drinks and were a little excited because of March madness
column5: but you refused to serve us because you thought we were under the influence because we were excited about the duke game and shouted out when they scored. I don't recommend this place to anyone.
